def_en: An escort is a person who travels with someone in order to protect or guard them.

def_cn: （陪同异性的）社交聚会陪伴者；（有时指）有偿社交伴侣
def_en: An escort is a person who accompanies another person of the opposite sex to a social event. Sometimes people are paid to be escorts.
If you escort someone somewhere, you accompany them there, usually in order to make sure that they leave a place or get to their destination.
